### Ena vector me 1500 times opou oi prwtes 1000 times einai random strings me times AGCT length =5

A tropos

```{r}

myVec_length = 1000
add_Length = 500

chars = c("A","C","G","T")

myStrings = replicate(myVec_length,paste(sample(chars,5,replace = TRUE), collapse=""))
myStrings

newVec = rep("AAAAA",add_Length)

myStrings = c(myStrings,newVec)

#myStrings

myList = list()
myList[["a"]]

for (elem in myStrings){
  if(is.null(myList[[elem]])){
    myList[[elem]]=1
  }
  else{
    myList[[elem]] = myList[[elem]]+1
  }
}

myList
```
